::Grimmler/Fliq::

A CR chamber in the Cybertronian Fire opens, letting Grimmler fall 
out of it and land face-first on the floor. He groans, pulling 
himself up and looking at Fliq.

"I feel like I've been hit with the whole slagging planet," he 
complains, rubbing his head. An annoyed look crosses his face when 
Fliq grins.

"That's about right." The fox-bot replies. "Come on, lets ask Iron 
for orders."

Grimmler nods, the two of them walking off toward Iron Raptor.
